info.name: ZiraAI Complete API Collection
info.description: Complete API collection for ZiraAI Plant Analysis system with authentication, authorization, subscription management, sponsorship features, and WhatsApp notifications. Updated with comprehensive endpoint coverage including all 120+ endpoints across 18 controllers. Version 6.1 includes new WhatsApp notification system integration.
